00104         public void Withdraw(double amount)
00105         {
00106             if (amount > 0.0)
00107             {
00108                 if (Balance > amount)
00109                 {
00110                     this.Balance -= amount;
00111                 }
00112                 else
00113                 {
00114                     throw new ArgumentException("Not enough founds on bank account to withdraw.");
00115                 }
00116             }

00118             {
00119                 throw new ArgumentException("There are not enough funds present to fulfill the required action.");
00120             }
00121         }

00171         internal static bool Validate(int accountNumber, String surname)
00172         {
00173             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(surname))
00174             {
00175                 ErrorMessages.Add(new ErrorMessage("Need the name of the account owner."));
00176             }
00177             if (accountNumber <= 0)
00178             {
00179                 ErrorMessages.Add(new ErrorMessage("Need a valid account number: greater 0."));
00180             }
00181             return ErrorMessages.Count == 0;
00182         }

00214         public BankAccount ParseFromString(string stringRepresentation)
00215         {
00216             string[] split = stringRepresentation.Split(',');
00217             String accountNumber = split[0];
00218             String surname = split[1];
00219             String balance = split[2];
00220             int accNumber = 0;
00221             double bal = 0;
00222             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(accountNumber))
00223             {
00224                 try
00225                 {
00226                     accNumber = int.Parse(accountNumber);
00227                 }
00228                 catch (FormatException e)
00229                 {
00230                     Console.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);
00231                 }
00232             }
00233             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(balance))
00234             {
00235                 try
00236                 {
00237                     bal = double.Parse(balance);
00238                 }
00239                 catch (FormatException e)
00240                 {
00241                     Console.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);
00242                 }
00243             }
00244             return new BankAccount(accNumber, surname, bal);
00245         }
